Description:
Our client is a leading EV solutions company in Asia. They are looking to hire a Key Accounts Manager for their operations in UAE. The candidate is expected to acquire new clientele and generate sales. The role reports to the Director-Business & Operations -EMEAManage and submit daily/ weekly and monthly sales reports.
generate business through partners and direct contacts.Skills
Skills: Preferably B.Tech/Diploma in Engg, and MBA with minimum 6-8 years of experience, preferably as KAM.

UAE sales experience for a minimum of 8 years, 
 Industry experience with EV sales/Battery sales/Energy equipment sales in Auto Sector is an advantage.
 Good interpersonal skills.
Being able to travel frequently within GCC & Africa 
Ability to discuss basic technical aspects of product/solution with the prospects.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
Target oriented and ability to deliver on sales and revenue targets
Ability to generate business through partners and direct contacts.
Candidate should be able to work with least supervision.
